title: Jess Wright sizzles in a tiny floral bikini and flaunts her toned figure in Marbella
text:
She's about to make her film debut in a gritty gangster drama Rise of the Footsoldier: The Spanish Heist- and attended the premiere in Marbella on Friday night.

And Jess Wright, 34, was glowing on Saturday as she showed off her toned legs and ample assets in a tiny floral bikini.

The former Towie star flaunted her sun-kissed skin to her 1.4m Instagram followers while staying at El Oceano Beach Hotel and Restaurant, near Marbella in Spain.

Stunning: Jess Wright, 34, flaunted her assets and enviable curves in a floral bikini on Saturday after attending the premiere of her film in Marbella

Jess confidently posed in front of the camera and played with her long dark tresses in one of the two glamorous shots.

In another the tanned beauty rearranged her barely there blue and pink costume from UK based brand Bikini Reef, while showcasing her taut midriff.

The beauty's colourful swimwear only helped to emphasis her enviable figure and featured two thin ties on the sides, hinting at a touch of a tan line.

Toned: The former Towie star showed off her sunkissed glow and toned body in two pictures shared on Instagram with her 1.4m followers

Jess' bikini top didn't leave much to the imagination, hardly covering the former reality TV star's assets.

To complete her poolside look Jess donned a pair of large aviator sunglasses with a gold frame.

She appeared to be fresh faced for a day catching some sun and ditched the rich palette of make-up which she rocked the previous night.

On Friday night Jess and her beau William Lee-Kemp attended the premiere of The Rise of the Footsoldier: The Spanish Heist.

Busty: Jess showed off her toned frame in the plunging blue ensemble which flaunted her midriff during the film's premiere on Friday

The film sees nightclub owner Pat Tate (Craig Fairbrass) seek to wreak vengeance on the man who had him put in jail.

Jess and William only went public with their romance this summer during a romantic getaway together.

The reality star's partner was finally revealed as a business owner, who is believed to be close pals with her younger brother Mark.

Happy couple: William couldn't take his eyes off Jess as they enjoyed a night at the premiere

A source told The Sun at the time: 'Jess and William are in love – they're very happy together and their friends and family couldn't be more chuffed for them.

'William shares a flat with Mark's best friend and they're all close mates. He definitely has the approval of Jess' family.

'His friends describe him as "Mr Normal" – he's not at all interested in fame or being in the public eye but that hasn't put him off being with Jess either.'

Wow: The former TOWIE star wore her dark tresses to the side and opted for a bold blue two piece, including a long sleeved crop-top and split skirt, for the event

Jess' most high-profile romance was her long-term relationship with former co-star Ricky Rayment, 28.

The trials and tribulations of their pair's union was played out on the ITVBe reality show, before they called time on things in late 2014.

TV star Jess went on to date Strictly's Giovanni Pernice, 28, last year, with the couple having a five month relationship before splitting with rumours the dancer couldn't handle her popularity.
description: Jess Wright, 34, stunned in a blue and pink floral bikini which showed off her enviable curves while in Spain on Saturday. The former Towie star attended the premiere for her first film on Friday night.
